extension_description.message: A Firefox extension that blocks distracting websites based on the user's location.

blocklist_title.description: Title for the blocklist section in the options page.

blocklist_description.message: Manage the list of websites that will be blocked based on your location.

location_permission.message: Location permission is required to block websites based on your current location.
location_permission.description: Message explaining the need for location permissions.

add_website.description: Button text for adding a website to the blocklist.

remove_website.description: Button text for removing a website from the blocklist.

save_settings.description: Button text for saving user settings.

settings_saved.description: Message displayed when settings are saved.

error_saving_settings.message: Error saving settings. Please try again.
error_saving_settings.description: Message displayed when there is an error saving settings.
